review: Very cumbersome to operate. One must have so much patience to set up the account and if you touch a letter and accidentally print it twice, you have to start all over again, What a PAIN! Similarly, when using my dvr service searching for a program, their system is so much EASIER.
author: ekg "nancynooz"

review: Dont buy this product ... all accidental order  will be charged to your account
author: kamesh

review: Great, works every time. So easy to use and has tons of stuff to check out.
author: Patrick White

review: Love this! It's easy to install and use, would definitely recommend
author: Jessica Kane

review: I love it it was so easy to install & i can move it to my other tv real easy  I love it so much I am going to get for all my tvs
author: Dawn

review: Was very wasy to install and get started. I like the Amazon Prime selection of entertainment. Am also using the fire stick to access Sling TV. And ots working very well. Am very pleased with this purchase.
author: Kiran Unni

review: Works beautifully, and easy to set up. I have an older TV so this is great for connecting to Netflix, Youtube, Pandora, etc...
